main.summary: This pseudo-interface exists only to generate documentation for the DataControl service and is not implemented. See DataControlAPI.json for OpenAPI specification.

method.name: Delete
method.returns: Object ID. HTTP status code indicates success or failure.

method.name: Get
method.returns: Serialized Object or ID if not found. HTTP status code indicates success or failure.

method.name: Store
method.returns: Object ID. HTTP status code indicates success or failure.
